verses.name: Habakkuk 2:18
verses.text: What profiteth the graven image that the maker thereof hath graven it; the molten image, and a teacher of lies, that the maker of his work trusteth therein, to make dumb idols?

verses.name: Habakkuk 2:19
verses.text: Woe unto him that saith to the wood, Awake; to the dumb stone, Arise, it shall teach! Behold, it is laid over with gold and silver, and there is no breath at all in the midst of it.

verses.name: Habakkuk 2:20
verses.text: But the Lord is in his holy temple: let all the earth keep silence before him.
